name: The Offers Of A Mere Monk
name_original: The Offers Of A Mere Monk
description:
Are you ready to do anything to please the Gods? are you ready to put your life on the line in order to have a chance at eternal peace?

Collect the Relics, fight chickens, save old men and please the gods. 

Controls- 

D - Move right 

A - Move left 

Spacebar - Jump 

Left Click - Attack
